name: webext-dynamic-content-scripts
description: Automatically inject your `content_scripts` on custom domains.
author: Federico Brigante <github@bfred.it> (bfred.it)

scripts.build: rollup -c node:webext --name DCS --banner //\ https://github.com/bfred-it/webext-dynamic-content-scripts --output.format umd --input src/index.js --file  dist/webext-dynamic-content-scripts.js --output.exports named
